title: Screaming Bee MorphVOX Pro 4.4.17 + Addons [ChingLiu]
description:
Compatible with many programs 

MorphVOX Pro voice changing software can be used with all online games including World of Warcraft, EVE Online, Second Life, Lord of the Rings Online, Everquest, Counter-Strike, Battlefield 2 and many more. 

It also integrates with VoIP and Instant Messaging programs such as Skype, Ventrilo, TeamSpeak, Yahoo Messenger, MSN Messenger, AIM, XFire, GoogleTalk, Roger Wilco and more.

In the studio, MorphVOX Pro integrates with multimedia applications such as Sound Forge, Vegas, ACID, Audacity, IClone and much more.

Features 
MorphVOX Pro has many premium features that distinguish it from other software products on the market:

* Advanced voice-learning algorithms for best quality sound
* Full integration with online games and chat programs
* Low bandwidth and CPU usage for excellent performance
* A large library of free voice and sound effect packs
* Backgrounds - sound like you are somewhere else
* Add your own sounds effects and backgrounds
* Advanced vocal tract filters for unlimited tweaking
* After Effects: add environmental effects to your voice
* Quick Voices: switch your voice with a single keystroke
* Quick Effects: Play any effect with a single button
* Audio Alarms: announce the time or play a clip.
* Morph audio files or record your morphed voice to a file.

Description of plugins and addons MorphVOX:

Plugins

This plugin allows you to easily select multiple source files, assign voices and output them to different destination files.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Effects Rack Plugin
Plugin that allows you to use VST-effects modules in MorphVOX Pro.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MorphVOX DJ Streaming
The plugin allows you to create a playlist of the existing files to be added to change the vote.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Text-To-VoIP Plugin
Write your message in the text box, you can easily communicate via voice chat without using your own voice.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Voice Splicer Plugin
The plugin allows you to change a few votes in the same audio file.

Change log after version 4.3.21

4.4.17 Add back support for Legacy Drivers 
4.4.13 Add update check back to menu 
4.4.12 New installers, support .net 4.0+, add install driver option on help 
4.4.9 Fix crash creating new alias, fix for non US Windows showing wrong language on voice names 
4.4.8 Minor updates 
4.4.7 Fix echo cancellation crash when listen delay is set high. 
4.4.6 Misc. updates to ScriptVOX connection 
4.4.5 Fix for crash on VST Plugin 
4.4.4 Only prompt feedback detection dialog once. 
4.4.3 Minor echo cancellation optimizations. 
4.4.2 Echo cancellation and screech detection improved for open microphones.
OS : XP, Vista (32/64), Windows 7/8 (32/64)

Language : English
